subject: Running
Missing Persons
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The ultrarunner Micah True, 58, was found in the mountainous Gila National Forest in New Mexico, with no obvious signs of injury, after his disappearance while on a 12-mile run.
snippet: The ultrarunner Micah True, 58, was found in the mountainous Gila National Forest in New Mexico, with no obvious signs of injury, after his disappearance while on a 12-mile run.
